column4: how can I remove ALL the functions that will turn off my LCD backlight on my laptop?

There's something called Caffeine out there that basically emulates a keypress every 59 seconds to prevent automatic backlight shutdown, etc. I don't know if it's got a Linux release, but you could take a look there..
Pidgin is good times, but I'd rather connect to irc with xchat
ok, I didn't know if it was a setting issue.  All I know is that it's getting annoying
